name: Rolltris
description:
Tetris tile matching game concept but instead of tiles falling you roll them on the ground.

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow keys to roll the piece.
  • Space to place
  • 1/2/3 Number keys to focus on one layer of blocks making other ones transparent
  • Q / E Rotate camera

Match 4 blocks of the same color to get them to disappear. Game ends when you block your starting position (indicated by red x blocks).
